name: Home (itch) (Raius)
description:
See below for downloadable version (talking to you, Chrome users)

My 'game' for month 2 of the One Game A Month challenge.

I don't know if I'd call this a game tbh. There's no real mechanics or challenge, it's just something to chill out and relax with if that's the kind of mood you're in.

I hope you like it!

All art, programming and music was done by me.

The text system is Fungus, a free, and excellent, tool for Unity.
